Name: Cooling Tower - Capacity: 350 to <750 Ton - Vibration isolated equipment that is not snubbed or restrained - Equipment fragility only

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing is per unit and is based upon 500 Ton.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given

DamageStates.Description: Damaged equipment and attached piping but anchorage is OK.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair damaged equipment and attached piping.
